title: Why am i not getting key fragments anymore??
body: Ive been playing for a while now and ive noticed the lack of key fragments lately. Ive been trying other techniques to achieve key fragments such as getting S ranks on champions i have not gotten a S rank on, Ive also tried getting a S rank on champs ive already gotten them on and just all around winning but ive still havent been getting my key fragments. Ive been stacking chests up but havent had keys to open them with, please if you can help me out in any way just let me know

replies.body: If I'm not mistaken after you get a certain amount of keys per cycle (Idk the cycle off the top of my head) You have a pretty much 0% chance of getting them. I think the number is 12 per cycle.
Oh ok thank you very much :D
is happend to me too ... i dont know i take S i take  box's but not keys i get honnor but never guys what is happend and btw my honnor lvl is not up too {{champion:50}} {{sticker:sg-shisa}}

Your Key Fragment *drop rate* is more of a curve than it is a line. This means that each drop reduces your chances of the next fragment dropping exponentially, and towards the end of the curve, fragment drops are **extremely rare**. This *drop rate* resets ~30 days after the first fragment drop, so you may be towards the end of this period before your drop rate resets.

Give it some time and you should start seeing more key fragments. If you don't see them later down the road, let me know. ^.^
alright ill let u know thanks for the help :)
